trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Mindflash | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Mindflash | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Mindflash with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Mindflash with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Mindflash.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Mindflash.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Mindflash single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Mindflash single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Mindflash will be able to single sign into the application at your Mindflash company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Mindflash will be able to single sign into the application at your Mindflash company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Mindflash
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Mindflash

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Mindflash.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Mindflash.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Mindflash.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Mindflash.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Mindflash, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Mindflash, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Mindflash</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Mindflash</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Mindflash with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Mindflash with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Mindflash application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Mindflash application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Mindflash page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Mindflash page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the Sign On URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.mindflash.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the Sign On URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.mindflash.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Mindflash page, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Mindflash page, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Send the metadatafile to the Mindflash support team.
trans-unit.target: Send the metadatafile to the Mindflash support team.

trans-unit.source: The single sign-on configuration has to be performed by the Mindflash support team.
trans-unit.target: The single sign-on configuration has to be performed by the Mindflash support team.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification as soon as the configuration has been completed.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification as soon as the configuration has been completed.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Mindflash, they must be provisioned into Mindflash.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Mindflash, they must be provisioned into Mindflash.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Mindflash, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Mindflash, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Mindflash company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Mindflash company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to Manage Users.
trans-unit.target: Go to Manage Users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Manage Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Manage Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the Add Users, and then click New.
trans-unit.target: Click the Add Users, and then click New.

trans-unit.source: In the Add New Users section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Add New Users section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add New Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add New Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Type the First name, Last name and Email of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the First name, Last name and Email of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click Add.
trans-unit.target: Click Add.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Mindflash user account creation tools or APIs provided by Mindflash to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Mindflash user account creation tools or APIs provided by Mindflash to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Mindflash **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Mindflash **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
